briefTitle: Improvement of Range of Motion in Frozen Shoulder in Breast Cancer Survivors
officialTitle: The Effectiveness of Intra-articular Steroid Injection in Breast Cancer Survivors With Adhesive Capsulitis According to the Thickness of Axillary Capsulitis Thickness
conditions: Breast Neoplasm, Shoulder Capsulitis, Range of Motion
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Range of motion of shoulder joint
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients who underwent breast cancer surgery within 6 months.
* Patients with shoulder pain and limited range of motion

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with infection
* Bilateral shoulder pain patient
* Patients with uncontrolled diabetes
